text:
According to the [multiple response types specification](http://openid.net/specs/oauth-v2-multiple-response-types-1_0-03.html#anchor5) all hybrid response types should return fragment-encoded responses.

However, according to the unit tests there might be some side effects.
title: Hybrid response types should be fragment-encoded
clean_text: accord multipl respons type specif hybrid respons type return fragmentencod respons howev accord unit test might side effect

title: Pull request merge from skion/oauthlib:fragment-hybrids to idan/oauthlib:master

text: If you want me to consider merging this, we need to understand the implications on existing clients/servers and fix the unit tests.

text: Yes, I'll have a look at what tests are affected by this and why.
@thedrow It created some problems with the inheritance of the AuthCode tests in the Hybrid flow tests. I've worked around that by making response modes more explicit in the tests.
